verses.verse: And the <S%H1486>lot<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3318>fell<s%> from <S%H4480>Jordan<s%> <S%H3383><s%> by <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> unto the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> on the <S%H4217>east,<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> that goeth <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H4480>Jericho<s%> <S%H3405><s%> throughout <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%>

And goeth <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4480>Bethel<s%> <S%H1008><s%> to <S%H3870>Luz,<s%> and passeth <S%H5674>along<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of <S%H757>Archi<s%> to <S%H5852>Ataroth,<s%>

And goeth <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of <S%H3311>Japhleti,<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of <S%H1032>Beth-horon<s%> the <S%H8481>nether,<s%> and <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H1507>Gezer:<s%> and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> thereof <S%H1961>are<s%> at the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>
So the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> took their <S%H5157>inheritance.<s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> thus: even the <S%H1366>border<s%> of their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> on the <S%H4217>east<s%> side <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5853>Ataroth-addar,<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H1032>Beth-horon<s%> the <S%H5945>upper;<s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> toward the <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H4366>Michmethah<s%> on the north <S%H4480>side;<s%> <S%H6828><s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5437>about<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%> unto <S%H8387>Taanath-shiloh,<s%> and passed <S%H5674>by<s%> it on the <S%H4480>east<s%> <S%H4217><s%> to <S%H3239>Janohah;<s%>

And it went <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H4480>Janohah<s%> <S%H3239><s%> to <S%H5852>Ataroth,<s%> and to <S%H5292>Naarath,<s%> and <S%H6293>came<s%> to <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> at <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

The <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H1980>out<s%> from <S%H4480>Tappuah<s%> <S%H8599><s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> unto the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H7071>Kanah;<s%> and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> thereof <S%H1961>were<s%> at the <S%H3220>sea.<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> by their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

And the <S%H3995>separate<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> were <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>

And they drove not <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H1507>Gezer:<s%> but the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H669>Ephraimites<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> under <S%H4522>tribute.<s%>
